action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

Hope all is going well. Please see below website requests:

  1. We want to update our Home Page banner image > are you able to do this for the front page - Ive attached a draft of the layout.
We want the video moved to the left hand side with the text on the right hand side of the screen. Please see attached. Let me know if you have any questions regarding this.

  1. Regarding Pricing on our website - Customers are still getting confused when selecting the tile and price - The Total Price under the product isn't large enough for the customer to see.

For example > https://www.designtiles.com.au/product/rice-series-gloss-wall-tile/
The Rice series Pricing only displays the cheapest pricing under the name of the heading i.e $139m2. There are two different prices for the different size tiles. We also had a customer try to dispute this although it says the total price at the bottom of the screen. The pricing needs to be clear.

Can we fix this problem by displaying the pricing saying:

From $139m2

and the Total Price $169m2 x 0.81 per box = $136.89
Could you make this more promient and bold please.

  1. Lastly - we would like to remove this section of the website as its currently not serving any purpose and isnt clickable. Photo Attached.
Thank you for all your help.

Looking forward to seeing the updates
Thank you



Please leave us a review here
